# NexT Util

[![npm-image]][npm-url]
[![lic-image]](LICENSE)
[![Theme Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/NexT-v7.3.0+-blue?style=flat-square)](https://theme-next.org)

Utilities for NexT.

## Installation

![size-image]
[![dm-image]][npm-url]
[![dt-image]][npm-url]

```bash
npm install next-util
```

## Usage

```js
const Util = require('next-util');
const utils = new Util(hexo, __dirname);
```
